text: Ana uli ndema jachampatile chipato chanti pakwete pamwapatisye (amagongo wenu) chanti iyyoyocho mwa winji wakawili mwatite: “Chityochele kwapi achi (chipatochi)?” Jilani: “Chalakwecho chityochele kwa jenumanja mwachimisyene (ligongo lyakunyosya kwenu). Chisimu Allah pa chindu chilichose awele Jwakombola
